hero-match.name: hero-match

mp.title: Hero Match (Multi-Player)
welcome<text>: - The board is 5x5 with 10 pairs and 5 wild cards
- Players have __15__ seconds to memorize all the cards.
- At each round, the computer will randomly pick a card, and each player has 5 seconds to pick the matching card.
- The game ends after 10 rounds and the players are ranked by correct picks.
mp.memorize-now: Memorize the cards. You have __15__ seconds.
mp.your-turn: ({ROUND}/10): The computer flipped {COMPUTER PICK}. Pick the matching card (you have __10__ seconds).

sp.title: Hero Match (Single-Player)
welcome<text>: - The player has __10__ seconds to memorize all the cards.
- At each round, the computer will randomly pick a card, and the player has 5 seconds to pick the matching card.
- The game ends after 8 rounds and the player is scored by correct picks.
sp.memorize-now: Memorize the cards. You have __15__ seconds.
sp.your-turn: ({ROUND}/8): The computer flipped {COMPUTER PICK}. Pick the matching card (you have __10__ seconds).
